comments:
-dir rtl is not supported on carbon. If Eclipse is launched with this param it is ignored and Eclipse runs in ltr mode.

If, however, this is given as an argument to a self host launcher, Eclipse will not start. I have reproduced this in both 3.3.1 and I20070911-0833.

On both builds, the splash screen appears for a second and then you get an OS error saying the application failed. The console shows something similar to this every time, though it seems to have the same error for a random number of threads (often 1, sometimes a few or even dozens):

Exception in thread "Thread-12" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.WidgetMethodHandler.getMethodToExecute(WidgetMethodHandler.java:193)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.WidgetMethodHandler.isEnabled(WidgetMethodHandler.java:184)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerProxy.isEnabled(HandlerProxy.java:263)
	at org.eclipse.core.commands.Command.isEnabled(Command.java:831)
	at org.eclipse.core.commands.Command.setHandler(Command.java:969)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerAuthority.updateCommand(HandlerAuthority.java:537)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerAuthority.activateHandler(HandlerAuthority.java:186)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerService.activateHandler(HandlerService.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerService.activateHandler(HandlerService.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerService.activateHandler(HandlerService.java:104)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerPersistence.readDefaultHandlersFromRegistry(HandlerPersistence.java:234)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerPersistence.read(HandlerPersistence.java:188)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.handlers.HandlerService.readRegistry(HandlerService.java:182)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench$37.runWithException(Workbench.java:1575)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.StartupThreading$StartupRunnable.run(StartupThreading.java:31)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:35)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages(Synchronizer.java:124)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:3254)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.observerProc(Display.java:2886)
Exception in thread "Thread-79" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:3254)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.observerProc(Display.java:2886)
